texts: {"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Vehicle details"}
'Pending suspension’ : a scheduled payment has failed and you now need to pay the outstanding balance.
If you do not pay the amount outstanding, your Auto Pay will be suspended. You need to pay the charge in another way or you will receive a penalty.

‘Suspended’: a scheduled payment has failed and you now need to pay the outstanding balance. If you drive any of your vehicles within the charging zone you will need to pay the charge in another way or you will receive a penalty.
If you do not clear your balance quickly, your Auto Pay service will be closed and you will need to pay registration charges to reactivate it.
'Active’: your Auto Pay service is working fully.
Find out which charges you need to pay to drive this vehicle in London.
You need to pay the Congestion Charge for this vehicle if you drive within the zone Monday to Friday, 07:00-18:00 excluding bank holidays and the period between Christmas Day and New Year's Day.
Based on the vehicle details entered and information held by the DVLA and TfL today, this vehicle is exempt from the Congestion Charge.
This may change - always check to see if you need to pay to drive within the zone.
This vehicle is currently registered for a 100% discount from the Congestion Charge. You can check when this discount expires in the 'Manage discounts' section of your account.
This vehicle is currently registered for a 90% Residents' discount. You can check when this discount expires in the 'Manage discounts' section of your account.
Based on the vehicle details entered and information held by the DVLA and TfL today, this vehicle is exempt from the ULEZ.
This may change - always check to see if you need to pay to drive within the zone.
Based on the vehicle details entered and information held by the DVLA and TfL today, you don't have to pay the ULEZ charge for this vehicle.
This may change - always check to see if you need to pay to drive within the zone.
This vehicle is currently registered for a 100% discount from the ULEZ.
This vehicle does not meet the ULEZ emissions standards. You need to pay the ULEZ charge if you drive within the zone. The zone operates at all times - charging days run from midnight to midnight.
If you believe this is incorrect, and you can supply evidence that your vehicle does meet the ULEZ emissions standards, you will need to register it with us .
This vehicle does not meet the ULEZ emissions standards. You need to pay the ULEZ charge if you drive within the zone. The zone operates at all times - charging days run from midnight to midnight.
If you believe this is incorrect, and you can supply evidence that your vehicle does meet the ULEZ emissions standards, you will need to register it with us .
Based on the vehicle details entered and information held by the DVLA and TfL today, this vehicle meets the ULEZ emissions standards. You don't have to pay the charge.
This vehicle does not meet the LEZ emissions standards. You need to pay the LEZ charge if you drive within the zone. The zone operates at all times - charging days run from midnight to midnight.
If you believe this is incorrect, and you can supply evidence that your vehicle does meet the LEZ emissions standards, you will need to register it with us .
This vehicle does not meet the LEZ emissions standards. You need to pay the LEZ charge if you drive within the zone. The zone operates at all times - charging days run from midnight to midnight.
If you believe this is incorrect, and you can supply evidence that your vehicle does meet the LEZ emissions standards, you will need to register it with us .
